web-1.title: E-Commerce Dashboard
web-1.description: Modern and responsive e-commerce management panel. Includes real-time sales analytics, product management, and customer tracking system.
web-1.purpose: Streamline e-commerce business operations with comprehensive analytics and management tools

web-2.title: Portfolio Website
web-2.description: Personal portfolio website. A modern CV site with dark/light theme support, animations, and responsive design.
web-2.purpose: Showcase professional skills and projects with an engaging, modern web presence

web-3.title: Task Management App
web-3.description: Task management application developed for team collaboration. Features Kanban board, time tracking, and project analytics.
web-3.purpose: Enhance team productivity through organized task management and collaboration tools
features: Kanban board for visual task organization

android-1.title: Fitness Tracker
android-1.description: Comprehensive fitness application with daily activity tracking, exercise plans, and nutrition monitoring.
android-1.purpose: Help users maintain a healthy lifestyle through comprehensive fitness tracking and guidance
features: Progress tracking with charts and statistics

android-2.title: Weather App
android-2.description: Modern weather application featuring current weather information, 7-day forecasts, and interactive maps.
android-2.purpose: Provide accurate and detailed weather information with intuitive visual presentation

android-3.title: Note Taking App
android-3.description: Advanced note-taking application with Markdown support, category system, and cloud synchronization.
android-3.purpose: Organize thoughts and information efficiently with advanced note-taking capabilities
features: Markdown support for rich text formatting

ios-1.title: Budget Tracker
ios-1.description: Budget tracking application developed for personal finance management. Features expense categories, charts, and goal setting.
ios-1.purpose: Empower users to take control of their finances through detailed budget tracking and analysis

ios-2.title: Recipe Book
ios-2.description: Recipe application featuring recipe collection, shopping list creation, and nutritional value calculation.
ios-2.purpose: Simplify cooking and meal planning with organized recipes and smart shopping features

ios-3.title: Meditation App
ios-3.description: Mindfulness application featuring daily meditation sessions, breathing exercises, and sleep stories.
ios-3.purpose: Promote mental wellness and mindfulness through guided meditation and relaxation techniques

common.aiGeneratedSummary: This summary was generated by AI based on the information in my CV.
common.infoButtonTooltip: I created this site using Cursor and prompt engineering skills without any Next.js knowledge.

bulletPoints: Supported integration and maintenance of money transfer systems for multiple financial partners using Golang and MSSQL.
Contributed to the development of scalable microservices responsible for domestic and international fund transfers.
Collaborated with external partners to ensure seamless API communication and SLA compliance.
Utilized GitLab CI/CD pipelines to automate testing and deployment of mission-critical services.
Implemented secure authentication and role-based access control using Keycloak across internal APIs and dashboards.
Participated in daily stand-ups and sprint plannings, rapidly adapting to a fast-paced fintech environment.
Developed key advertising products (Sponsored Products, Sponsored Brands, FacebookAds, HepsiAds Campaigns) using .NET Core, Golang, Kafka, Redis, Elasticsearch, MongoDB, and Google BigQuery.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams including product management and QA to ensure timely delivery of high-quality software releases.
Developed and maintained microservices-based applications using Docker and Kubernetes for improved scalability and reliability.
Utilized Google BigQuery for data analytics and reporting, enabling data-driven decision making.
Configured and optimized Elasticsearch search engine to improve product search results and solve relevant product rotation in Sponsored Products.
Implemented Kafka messaging for real-time data processing and integration, improving system scalability.
Led migration from Elasticsearch to OpenSearch, optimizing search capabilities and data processing.
Implemented SOX compliance measures, ensuring adherence to financial and IT security standards.
Optimized application performance and reliability by utilizing Go, MongoDB, Redis, and unit testing as a Back-End Developer at Getir within the BiTaksi team.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to align backend development with front-end application requirements and corporate goals.
Contributed updates in backend systems, leading to more robust and scalable solutions.
Worked as a Back-End Developer for the Hepsiburada HepsiAds team, focusing on the development and optimization of Sponsored Products, Sponsored Brands, FacebookAds, and HepsiAds campaigns.
Utilized the same technology stack as in my subsequent internal role, including .NET Core, Golang,Kafka, Redis, Elasticsearch, MongoDB, and Google BigQuery.
Contributed to significant revenue growth through enhancements in advertising products, mirroring the achievements detailed in my internal position at Hepsiburada.
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to ensure the delivery of high-quality software releases, paralleling my later internal responsibilities.
Maintained and scaled microservices-based applications, consistent with the practices adopted during my internal tenure.
Coordinated and executed various events for GDG Antalya and Wtm Antalya, including speaker selection, logistics, and sponsorship agreements
Managed event budgets, ensuring expenses were kept within allocated limits and that financial reports were accurate and timely
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to plan and execute successful events, resulting in positive feedback from attendees and increased community engagement

work.title: Work Experience Summary
items: Over 3 years of experience in Back-End Development
Specialized in advertising technologies at Hepsiburada
Strong expertise in .NET Core, Golang, and microservices architecture
Proficient in data processing with Kafka and BigQuery
Skilled in search optimization with Elasticsearch/OpenSearch

items: Soft Skills: Team Collaboration, Problem Solving
